content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'Estilo de vida':

content.stimulus_en: He is (active) ________ than his brother.
My life is (busy) ________ than it was last year.
City life is (stressful) ________ than village life.
A simple lifestyle is (good) ________ for the mind.
Is it (easy) ________ to live in a small town?
A healthy diet is (important) ________ than exercise.
My schedule is busier than usual this week.
A life simple can be better for your overall happiness.
Living in the city is much more stressful than living in a village.
He much is more active than he used to be.
A healthy lifestyle is more important than having a lot of money.
Is easier it to make friends in a small town?
The experience related to Saludable is '________'.
Stressful
The experience related to Relajado is '________'.
Active
The experience related to Tradicional is '________'.
Modern
The experience related to Complicado is '________'.
Sustainable
